name: Homemade Fruit Popsicles
description: These Fruit Pops are so fun and easy, made with just three ingredients. They're a summer treat you can feel good about giving your kids.
instructions: Assemble: Add fruit to your popsicle mold (I use this one), alternating different kinds of fruit until the molds are filled almost to the top. Gently fill the mold with apple juice, leaving at least ⅛ in headspace and place the popsicle stick inside. Freeze for at least 6 hours or overnight.
